name: inactively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves doing nothing: Millions of small investors hold units in inactively managed funds. When stressed, the animals spent more time moving and less time inactively lying down.
More examplesFewer examplesThe nation must not, and will not, inactively await the consequences of this disaster. The system had not been operational for some time and was being inactively managed. We can either inactively wait for the situation to pass, or adapt and overcome the challenges we face.
